name: Sex with Teachers
description:
Sex with Teachers - is the simplest puzzle which can help you to develop your visual memory and enjoy hot pictures of sexy ladies.
The idea of the game is easy - you need to find all pair cards on the every level. As soon as you do that, a large picture of one of the hot lady will be opened for you. After the doing all the twenty levels, a gallery will be opened and you can see all the girls more detailed. Play and have fun!
KEY FEATURES:
- Simple and clear gameplay.
- Relaxing soundtrack.
- Nice pictures.
- An unforgettable experience.
